trans-unit.target: 当用户想取消给定的元素时,取消事件会被触发。

trans-unit.source: The candidate IP addresses are always exposed to the application through ip, and unsavory applications can in turn potentially reveal the address to the user. This can occur without the remote peer's consent.
trans-unit.target: 候选IP地址始终通过 ip 暴露给应用程序，而不良的应用程序又可能会将地址透露给用户。未经远程对等方的同意，可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The candidate is a host candidate, whose IP address as specified in the RTCIceCandidate.ip property is in fact the true address of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 候选者是主机候选者，其 RTCIceCandidate.ip 属性中指定的IP地址实际上是远程对等方的真实地址。

trans-unit.source: The candidate is a host candidate, whose IP address as specified in the RTCIceCandidate.ip property is in fact the true address of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 候选者是主机候选者，其 RTCIceCandidate.ip 属性中指定的IP地址实际上是远程对等方的真实地址。

trans-unit.source: The candidate is a peer reflexive candidate; the ip is an intermediary address assigned by the STUN server to represent the candidate's peer anonymously.
trans-unit.target: 候选人是同辈自反候选人；该 ip 是由STUN服务器分配匿名代表候选人的同行中介地址。

trans-unit.source: The candidate is a relay candidate, obtained from a TURN server. The relay candidate's IP address is an address the TURN server uses to forward the media between the two peers.
trans-unit.target: 候选者是一个中继候选者,从TURN服务器获得。中继候选者的IP地址是TURN服务器用于在两个对等体之间转发媒体的地址。

trans-unit.source: The candidate is a server reflexive candidate; the ip indicates an intermediary address assigned by the STUN server to represent the candidate's peer anonymously.
trans-unit.target: 候选人是服务器自反候选人；该 ip 表示由STUN服务器分配匿名代表候选人的同行中介地址。

trans-unit.source: The candidate will use the UDP transport protocol for its data. This is the preferred protocol for media interactions because of its better performance profile.
trans-unit.target: 候选人将使用UDP传输协议为其数据。这是媒体交互的首选协议，因为它具有更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: The candidate, if selected, would use TCP as the transport protocol for its data. The tcpType property provides additional information about the kind of TCP candidate represented by the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该候选者，它将使用TCP作为其数据的传输协议。所述 tcpType 属性提供关于由对象表示的种类的TCP候选的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The candidate, if selected, would use TCP as the transport protocol for its data. The tcpType property provides additional information about the kind of TCP candidate represented by the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该候选者，它将使用TCP作为其数据的传输协议。所述 tcpType 属性提供关于由对象表示的种类的TCP候选的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The canvas overview and tutorial I found here at MDN are great, but nobody had written about animation yet, so I thought I'd try a port of a basic raycaster I'd worked on a while ago, and see what sort of performance we can expect from a JavaScript-controlled pixel buffer.
trans-unit.target: 我在MDN上找到的画布概述和教程很棒，但是还没有人写过关于动画的文章，所以我想我会尝试一下我之前研究过的基本raycaster的端口，看看我们有什么样的性能可以从JavaScript控制的像素缓冲区中获得期望。

trans-unit.source: The canvas API is able to use any of the following data types as an image source:
trans-unit.target: 画布API能够使用以下任何一种数据类型作为图像源。

trans-unit.source: The canvas contains or may contain pixels which were loaded from an origin other than the one from which the document itself was loaded. To avoid SecurityError being thrown in this situation, configure CORS to allow the source image to be use in this way. See Allowing cross-origin use of images and canvas.
trans-unit.target: 画布包含或可能包含从其他来源加载的像素，而不是从其本身加载文档的来源。为避免在这种情况下引发 SecurityError ，请将CORS配置为允许以这种方式使用源映像。请参阅允许跨域使用图像和画布。

trans-unit.source: The canvas in Safari 2.0.1 performed surprisingly well. With the blockiness factor cranked up to render slivers 8 pixels wide, I can run a 320 x 240 window at 24 fps on my Apple mini. Firefox 1.5 Beta 1 is even faster; I can run 320 x 240 at 24 fps with 4 pixel slivers. Not exactly a new member of the ID software family, but pretty decent considering it's a fully interpreted environment, and I didn't have to worry about memory allocation or video modes or coding inner routines in assembler or anything. The code does attempt to be very efficient, using array look-ups of pre-computed values, but I'm no optimization guru, so things could probably be written faster.
trans-unit.target: Safari 2.0.1中的画布表现出奇的好。将阻挡系数调高到8像素宽,我可以在Apple mini上以24帧/秒的速度运行一个320 x 240的窗口。Firefox 1.5 Beta 1的速度更快,我可以用4像素的slivers以24 fps的速度运行320 x 240。不完全是ID软件家族的新成员,但考虑到它是一个完全解释的环境,而且我不必担心内存分配或视频模式或在汇编器中编码内部例程或任何东西,所以相当体面。这段代码确实试图非常高效,使用数组查找预先计算的值,但我不是优化大师,所以事情可能会写得更快。

trans-unit.source: The canvas is initially blank. To display something, a script first needs to access the rendering context and draw on it. The <canvas> element has a method called getContext(), used to obtain the rendering context and its drawing functions. getContext() takes one parameter, the type of context. For 2D graphics, such as those covered by this tutorial, you specify "2d" to get a CanvasRenderingContext2D.
trans-unit.target: 画布最初是空白的。要显示某些内容，脚本首先需要访问渲染上下文并在其上进行绘制。所述 <canvas> 元件具有被调用方法 getContext() ，用于获得呈现上下文和它的绘图功能。 getContext() 使用一个参数，即上下文的类型。对于2D图形（例如本教程介绍的图形），您指定 "2d" 以获得 CanvasRenderingContext2D 。

trans-unit.source: The canvas rendering context provides two methods to render text:
trans-unit.target: 画布渲染上下文提供了两种方法来渲染文本。

trans-unit.source: The canvas state
trans-unit.target: 画布状态

trans-unit.source: The canvas's bitmap is not origin clean; at least some of its contents come from secure
trans-unit.target: 画布的位图并不干净,至少有一部分内容来自于安全的

trans-unit.source: The canvas's bitmap is not origin clean; at least some of its contents have or may have been loaded from a site other than the one from which the document itself was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 画布的位图不是原点干净的;至少它的一些内容已经或可能已经从文档本身加载的站点以外的站点加载。

trans-unit.source: The capitalization of "Id" in the name of this method must be correct for the code to function; getElementByID() is not valid and will not work, however natural it may seem.
trans-unit.target: 此方法名称中大写的 "Id" 必须正确才能使代码起作用； getElementByID() 是不是有效，将无法正常工作，但自然，它可能看起来。

trans-unit.source: The caret location will be within this node. This value can also be set to null — if null is specified, the method will behave like Selection.removeAllRanges(), i.e. all ranges will be removed from the selection.
trans-unit.target: 插入符号的位置将在此节点内。该值也可以设置为 null －如果指定 null ，则该方法的行为类似于 Selection.removeAllRanges() ，即所有范围将从选择中删除。

trans-unit.source: The center of rotation is blue. The non-rotated rectangle is gray, and the rotated rectangle is red.
trans-unit.target: 旋转的中心是蓝色的。非旋转的矩形为灰色,旋转后的矩形为红色。

trans-unit.source: The center of the range of frequencies.
trans-unit.target: 频率范围的中心。

trans-unit.source: The central (C) is mixed with the lateral non-surround channels (L and R). As it is mixed down to two channels, it is mixed at a lower power: in each case it is multiplied by √2/2. The surround channels are passed unchanged. The subwoofer (LFE) channel is lost.
trans-unit.target: 中央（ C ）与侧面非环绕通道（ L 和 R ）混合在一起。当它向下混合到两个通道时，它以较低的功率进行混合：在每种情况下都乘以 √2/2 。环绕声通道保持不变。低音炮（ LFE ）通道丢失。

trans-unit.source: The central channel (C) is summed with each lateral surround channel (SL or SR) and mixed to each lateral channel. As it is mixed down to two channels, it is mixed at a lower power: in each case it is multiplied by √2/2. The subwoofer (LFE) channel is lost.
trans-unit.target: 中央通道（ C ）与每个横向环绕通道（ SL 或 SR ）相加，并混合到每个横向通道。当它向下混合到两个通道时，它以较低的功率进行混合：在每种情况下都乘以 √2/2 。低音炮（ LFE ）通道丢失。

trans-unit.source: The change starts at the time specified in startTime and exponentially moves towards the value given by the target parameter. The decay rate as defined by the timeConstant parameter is exponential; therefore the value will never reach target completely, but after each timestep of length timeConstant, the value will have approached target by another
trans-unit.target: 更改从 startTime 中指定的时间开始，并以指数方式移向 target 参数给定的值。由 timeConstant 参数定义的衰减率是指数的；因此，该值将永远不会完全达到 target ，但是在长度为 timeConstant 的每个时间步长之后，该值将已接近另一个 target

trans-unit.source: The changes to the drawScene() function are simple.
trans-unit.target: 对 drawScene() 函数的更改很简单。

trans-unit.source: The channel count is 1 for monaural sound, 2 for stereo, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通道数为1为单声道,2为立体声,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The channel number of the current AudioBuffer to copy the channel data to. If channelNumber is greater than or equal toAudioBuffer.numberOfChannels, an INDEX_SIZE_ERR will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 要复制通道数据的当前 AudioBuffer 的通道号。如果channelNumber大于或等于 AudioBuffer.numberOfChannels ，则将抛出 INDEX_SIZE_ERR 。

trans-unit.source: The channel number of the current AudioBuffer to copy the channel data from.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 中复制通道数据的当前AudioBuffer的通道号。

trans-unit.source: The channel property is an index representing the particular channel to get data for. An index value of 0 represents the first channel. If the channel index value is greater than of equal to AudioBuffer.numberOfChannels, an INDEX_SIZE_ERR exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: channel属性是一个索引，表示要为其获取数据的特定通道。索引值为0表示第一个通道。如果 channel 索引值大于等于 AudioBuffer.numberOfChannels ，则将引发 INDEX_SIZE_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: The cheapest option is to use a mobile device, supporting browser, and device mount (e.g. Google Cardboard). This won't be quite as good an experience as dedicated hardware, but you won't need to purchase a powerful computer or dedicated VR display.
trans-unit.target: 最便宜的选择是使用移动设备、支持的浏览器和设备支架(如谷歌Cardboard)。这不会有专用硬件那么好的体验,但你不需要购买强大的电脑或专用的VR显示器。

trans-unit.source: The chunk to enqueue.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的块。

trans-unit.source: The chunks inside the stream are read by a reader — this processes the data one chunk at a time, allowing you to do whatever kind of operation you want to do on it. The reader plus the other processing code that goes along with it is called a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 流中的数据块由读取器读取 -一次处理一个数据块，从而使您可以对数据执行任何类型的操作。读者及其附带的其他处理代码称为使用者。

trans-unit.source: The chunks placed in a stream are said to be enqueued — this means they are waiting in a queue ready to be read. An internal queue keeps track of the chunks that have not yet been read (see the Internal queues and queueing strategies section below).
trans-unit.target: 放置在流中的块被称为已排队 -这意味着它们正在队列中等待读取。一个内部队列跟踪尚未被读取的块（见内部队列和下面排队策略部分）。

trans-unit.source: The cleared area is rectangular in shape, with its top-left corner at (10, 10). The cleared area has a width of 120 and a height of 100.
trans-unit.target: 清理出来的区域是长方形的,其左上角在(10,10)。清理区的宽度为120,高度为100。

trans-unit.source: The client application
trans-unit.target: 客户端应用程序

trans-unit.source: The client can solicit extensions and/or subprotocols here; see Miscellaneous for details. Also, common headers like User-Agent, Referer, Cookie, or authentication headers might be there as well. Do whatever you want with those; they don't directly pertain to the WebSocket. It's also safe to ignore them. In many common setups, a reverse proxy has already dealt with them.
trans-unit.target: 客户可以在这里请求扩展和/或子协议；有关详细信息，请参见其他。另外，常见的标头（如 User-Agent ， Referer ， Cookie 或身份验证标头）也可能在那里。用这些做任何你想做的事；它们与WebSocket不直接相关。忽略它们也是安全的。在许多常见设置中，反向代理已经处理了它们。

trans-unit.source: The client is terminating the connection because it expected the server to negotiate one or more extension, but the server didn't.
trans-unit.target: 客户端正在终止连接,因为它期望服务器协商一个或多个扩展,但服务器没有。

trans-unit.source: The client may close the connection if it doesn't get the subprotocol it wants.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端没有得到想要的子协议,可能会关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: The client sends back to the server its cookies previously stored
trans-unit.target: 客户端将之前存储的Cookies发回给服务器。

trans-unit.source: The client will send a request to a STUN server on the Internet who will reply with the client’s public address and whether or not the client is accessible behind the router’s NAT.
trans-unit.target: 客户端将向Internet上的STUN服务器发送请求，该服务器将使用客户端的公共地址以及客户端是否可以在路由器NAT后面进行访问进行回复。

trans-unit.source: The client's type as a string. It can be "window", "worker", or "sharedworker".
trans-unit.target: 客户端的类型为字符串。它可以是“ window" ，“ worker" 或“ sharedworker" 。

trans-unit.source: The clientDataJSON object is an ArrayBuffer containing a JSON String of the various browser data that was used for the WebAuthn create() or get() call. It is included in both an AuthenticatorAttestationResponse and an AuthenticatorAssertionResponse within a PublicKeyCredential. The reason for storing the data as a ArrayBuffer rather than a String or an actual JavaScript object is that the object is effectively signed over by the authenticator, and if the order of the properties of the JavaScript object were not preserved then the signature verification would fail.
trans-unit.target: clientDataJSON对象是一个ArrayBuffer,包含了用于WebAuthn创建()或获取()调用的各种浏览器数据的JSON字符串。它同时包含在一个PublicKeyCredential中的AuthenticatorAttestationResponse和AuthenticatorAssertionResponse中。之所以将数据存储为ArrayBuffer而不是字符串或实际的JavaScript对象,是因为该对象被验证者有效地签名了,如果JavaScript对象的属性顺序没有被保留,那么签名验证就会失败。

trans-unit.source: The clipping of points and polygons from clip space actually happens after the homogeneous coordinates have been transformed back into Cartesian coordinates (by dividing by w). This final space is known as "normalized device coordinates" or NDC.
trans-unit.target: 从剪接空间剪接点和多边形,实际上是在同质坐标转化回笛卡尔坐标(通过除以w)之后发生的。这个最终空间被称为 "归一化设备坐标 "或NDC。

trans-unit.source: The clipping region is a full circle, with its center at (100, 75), and a radius of 50.
trans-unit.target: 剪切区域是一个完整的圆,其中心在(100,75),半径为50。

trans-unit.source: The clockwise rotation of the transducer (e.g. pen stylus) around its major axis in degrees, with a value in the range 0 to 359.
trans-unit.target: 换能器(如钢笔测针)绕其主要轴线顺时针旋转的度数,数值范围为0~359。

trans-unit.source: The code I ended up with is a regurgitated amalgam of the raycaster chapters from an old André LaMotheTricks of the Game Programming Gurus book (ISBN: 0672305070), and a java raycaster I found online, filtered through my compulsion to rename everything so it makes sense to me, and all the tinkering that had to be done to make things work well.
trans-unit.target: 我最终得到的代码是《 Game Programming Gurus》一书的旧版AndréLaMothe Tricks上的raycaster章节的反汇编，（ISBN：0672305070），以及我在网上找到的Java raycaster，通过强迫进行过滤以重命名所有内容，因此对我而言，还有为使事情顺利进行而必须进行的所有修补工作。

trans-unit.source: The code above generates an event every second, with the event type "ping". Each event's data is a JSON object containing the ISO 8601 timestamp corresponding to the time at which the event was generated. At random intervals, a simple message (with no event type) is sent.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码每秒钟生成一个事件,事件类型为 "ping"。每个事件的数据是一个JSON对象,包含ISO 8601时间戳,对应事件生成的时间。每隔一段时间,就会发送一条简单的消息(没有事件类型)。

trans-unit.target: 该代码还处理从 fetch() 操作引发的异常。注意，HTTP错误响应（例如404）不会触发异常。它将返回一个具有适当错误代码集的普通响应对象。

trans-unit.source: The code begins by creating a new DataTransfer object into which the text will be placed for sending to the clipboard. DataTransferItemList.add() is called to add the text to the DataTransfer, then write() is called, specifying both a fulfillment function and an error function.
trans-unit.target: 该代码首先创建一个新的 DataTransfer 对象，将文本放置在该对象中以发送到剪贴板。调用 DataTransferItemList.add() 将文本添加到 DataTransfer ，然后调用 write() ，同时指定实现函数和错误函数。

trans-unit.source: The code below is based on the sample the specification, though it adds a few things that make it function better. It shows a function called viewportHandler(). When called it queries the offsetLeft and height properties for values it uses in a CSS translate() method. You invoke this function by passing it to both event calls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码基于规范示例，尽管它添加了一些使其功能更好的东西。它显示了一个名为 viewportHandler() 的函数。调用时，它会查询offsetLeft和height属性以获取其在CSS translate() 方法中使用的值。您可以通过将其传递给两个事件调用来调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: The code below parses a set of declarations for the transform property. The second code block shows the structure of the returned object as it would be rendered in a developer tools console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码分析了 transform 属性的一组声明。第二个代码块显示了将在开发人员工具控制台中呈现的返回对象的结构。

trans-unit.source: The code below should be self-explanatory. We loop through the document.images container and add new canvas elements accordingly. Probably the only thing to note, for those not so familiar with the DOM, is the use of the Node.insertBefore method. insertBefore() is a method of the parent node (a table cell) of the element (the image) before which we want to insert our new node (the canvas element).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码应该是不言自明的。我们遍历 document.images 容器，并相应地添加新的canvas元素。对于那些不太熟悉DOM的人来说，唯一需要注意的就是使用 Node.insertBefore 方法。 insertBefore() 是元素（图像）的父节点（表单元）的方法，我们要在其之前插入新节点（canvas元素）。

trans-unit.source: The code creates a new <input> element by calling Document.createElement(), then serializes it into XML using serializeToString().
trans-unit.target: 该代码通过调用 Document.createElement() 创建一个新的 <input> 元素，然后使用 serializeToString() 将其序列化为XML 。

trans-unit.source: The code examples in this tutorial can also be found in the webgl-examples GitHub repository.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在webgl-examples GitHub存储库中找到本教程中的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The code handles exceptions thrown from the fetch() operation. Note that an HTTP error response (e.g., 404) will not trigger an exception. It will return a normal response object that has the appropriate error code.

trans-unit.source: The code in lines 12-17 fetches any unprocessed mutation records and invokes the callback with that list of records so that they can be processed. This is done immediately prior to calling disconnect() to stop observing the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 第12-17行中的代码获取所有未处理的变异记录，并使用该记录列表调用回调，以便可以对其进行处理。这是在调用 disconnect() 停止观察DOM 之前立即完成的。

trans-unit.source: The code in lines 4-12 handle creating the new HTML document and inserting some content into it. Line 4 uses createHTMLDocument() to construct a new HTML document whose <title> is "New Document". Lines 5 and 6 create a new paragraph element with some simple content, and then lines 8-12 handle inserting the new paragraph into the new document.
trans-unit.target: 第4-12行中的代码负责创建新的HTML文档，并将一些内容插入其中。第4行使用 createHTMLDocument() 构造一个新的HTML文档，其 <title> 为“ New Document”。第5和6行创建具有一些简单内容的新段落元素，然后第8-12行处理将新段落插入到新文档中的过程。

trans-unit.source: The code is derived from the ISO 3166-2 standard, which defines codes for identifying the subdivisions (e.g., states, provinces, autonomous regions, etc.) of all countries in the world.
trans-unit.target: 该代码来源于ISO 3166-2标准,该标准规定了用于识别世界各国分区(如州、省、自治区等)的代码。

trans-unit.source: The code is fetched from the HTML document by obtaining the value of the text node contained within the <script> element with the specified ID. Then a new shader of the specified type is created using gl.createShader().
trans-unit.target: 通过获取包含在具有指定ID 的 <script> 元素中的文本节点的值，从HTML文档中获取代码。然后，使用 gl.createShader() 创建指定类型的新着色器。

trans-unit.source: The code is taken from the "SVGAElement example code"

trans-unit.source: The configuration of an endpoint on a WebRTC connection is called a session description. The description includes information about the kind of media being sent, its format, the transfer protocol being used, the endpoint's IP address and port, and other information needed to describe a media transfer endpoint. This information is exchanged and stored using Session Description Protocol (SDP); if you want details on the format of SDP data, you can find it in RFC 2327.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC连接上端点的配置称为会话描述。该描述包括有关正在发送的媒体类型，其格式，使用的传输协议，端点的IP地址和端口的信息，以及描述媒体传输端点所需的其他信息。使用会话描述协议（SDP）交换和存储此信息；如果需要有关SDP数据格式的详细信息，可以在RFC 2327中找到它。

trans-unit.source: The connection object is useful for deciding whether to preload resources that take large amounts of bandwidth or memory. This example would be called soon after page load to check for a connection type where preloading a video may not be desirable. If a cellular connection is found, then the preloadVideo flag is set to false. For simplicity and clarity, this example only tests for one connection type. A real-world use case would likely use a switch statement or some other method to check all of the possible values of NetworkInformation.type. Regardless of the type value you can get an estimate of connection speed through the NetworkInformation.effectiveType property.
trans-unit.target: 连接对象对于确定是否预加载占用大量带宽或内存的资源很有用。页面加载后不久将调用此示例，以检查可能不希望预加载视频的连接类型。如果找到了蜂窝连接，则将 preloadVideo 标志设置为false。为简单起见，此示例仅测试一种连接类型。实际的用例可能会使用switch语句或某种其他方法来检查 NetworkInformation.type 的所有可能值。不管 type 值如何，您都可以通过 NetworkInformation.effectiveType 属性来估计连接速度。

trans-unit.target: 连接的 signalingState 为 "closed" ，表示该连接当前未打开，因此无法进行协商。

trans-unit.source: The cursor does not require us to select the data based on a key; we can just grab all of it. Also note that in each iteration of the loop, you can grab data from the current record under the cursor object using cursor.value.foo. For a complete working example, see our IDBCursor example (view example live.)
trans-unit.target: 游标不需要我们根据键选择数据；我们可以抓住所有这些。还要注意，在循环的每次迭代中，都可以使用 cursor.value.foo 从光标对象下的当前记录中获取数据。有关完整的工作示例，请参阅我们的IDBCursor示例（查看示例live。）

trans-unit.source: The cursor has a source that indicates which index or object store it is iterating over. It has a position within the range, and moves in a direction that is increasing or decreasing in the order of record keys. The cursor enables an application to asynchronously process all the records in the cursor's range.
trans-unit.target: 游标有一个源,表示它正在迭代的是哪个索引或对象存储空间,它在范围内有一个位置,并按记录键的增减顺序移动。它在范围内有一个位置,并按照记录键的顺序向着增加或减少的方向移动。游标使应用程序能够异步处理游标范围内的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: The custom stream constructor has a start() method that uses a WindowTimers.setInterval() call to generate a random string every second. ReadableStreamDefaultController.enqueue() is then used to enqueue it into the stream. When the button is pressed, the interval is cancelled, and a function called readStream() is invoked to read the data back out of the stream again. We also close the stream, as we’ve stopped enqueueing chunks to it.
trans-unit.target: 自定义流构造函数具有一个 start() 方法，该方法使用 WindowTimers.setInterval() 调用每秒生成一个随机字符串。然后使用 ReadableStreamDefaultController.enqueue() 将其加入流中。当按下按钮时，时间间隔被取消，称为 readStream() 的函数被调用以再次从流中读取数据。我们也关闭了流，因为我们不再让大块入队。

trans-unit.source: The data is read sequentially in small pieces called chunks. A chunk can be a single byte, or it can be something larger such as a typed array of a certain size. A single stream can contain chunks of different sizes and types.
trans-unit.target: 数据按称为块的小块顺序读取。块可以是单个字节，也可以是更大的东西，例如一定大小的类型化数组。单个流可以包含不同大小和类型的块。

trans-unit.source: The data is written to the stream via a writer, one chunk at a time. A chunk can take a multitude of forms, just like the chunks in a reader. You can use whatever code you like to produce the chunks ready for writing; the writer plus the associated code is called a producer.
trans-unit.target: 数据通过写入器一次写入一个块，然后写入到流中。块可以采用多种形式，就像阅读器中的块一样。您可以使用任何喜欢的代码来生成可以编写的块。作者加上相关的代码称为生产者。

trans-unit.source: The diagram below shows how this works; an input value, N, is set as the value of the ConstantSourceNode.offset property. The ConstantSourceNode can have as many outputs as necessary; in this case, we've connected it to three nodes: two GainNodes and a StereoPannerNode. So N becomes the value of the specified parameter (gain for the GainNodes and pan for the StereoPannerNode.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了它是如何工作的；输入值 N 设置为 ConstantSourceNode.offset 属性的值。所述 ConstantSourceNode 可以有多达输出作为必要的;在这种情况下，我们将其连接到三个节点：两个 GainNode 和一个 StereoPannerNode 。所以 N 变为指定参数的值（ gain 为 GainNode S和泛为 StereoPannerNode 。

trans-unit.source: The difference between FormData.set and append() is that if the specified key already exists, FormData.set will overwrite all existing values with the new one, whereas append() will append the new value onto the end of the existing set of values.
trans-unit.target: FormData.set 和 append() 之间的区别在于，如果指定的键已经存在， FormData.set 将使用新的键覆盖所有现有值，而 append() 会将新值追加到现有值集的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The difference between Headers.set and append() is that if the specified header already exists and accepts multiple values, Headers.set will overwrite the existing value with the new one, whereas append() will append the new value onto the end of the set of values.
trans-unit.target: Headers.set 和 append() 之间的区别在于，如果指定的标头已经存在并接受多个值，则 Headers.set 将用新的值覆盖现有值，而 append() 将新的值附加到末尾。一组值。

trans-unit.source: The difference between set() and FormData.append is that if the specified key does already exist, set() will overwrite all existing values with the new one, whereas FormData.append will append the new value onto the end of the existing set of values.
trans-unit.target: set() 和 FormData.append 之间的区别在于，如果指定的键已经存在，则 set() 将用新的键覆盖所有现有值，而 FormData.append 会将新值追加到现有键集的末尾。价值观。

trans-unit.source: The difference between set() and Headers.append is that if the specified header already exists and accepts multiple values, set() overwrites the existing value with the new one, whereas Headers.append appends the new value to the end of the set of values.
trans-unit.target: set() 和 Headers.append 之间的区别是，如果指定的标头已经存在并接受多个值，则 set() 用新的值覆盖现有值，而 Headers.append 将新值追加到set的末尾。价值观。

trans-unit.source: The difference between these can best be described using the image on the right. A quadratic Bézier curve has a start and an end point (blue dots) and just one control point (indicated by the red dot) while a cubic Bézier curve uses two control points.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用右侧的图像很好地描述它们之间的区别。二次贝塞尔曲线有一个起点和一个终点（蓝点），只有一个控制点（由红点表示），而三次贝塞尔曲线则使用两个控制点。

trans-unit.source: The difference is that when close is called, any previously enqueued chunks are written and finished with before the stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 不同的是,当调用close时,在流被关闭之前,任何之前的enqueued chunks都会被写入并完成。

trans-unit.target: 当然，引发一切的事件处理程序是 drop 事件的处理程序：

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the JavaScript instanceof operator to determine which type of track the event occurred on, then outputs to console a message indicating what kind of track it is and whether it's being added to or removed from the element.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用JavaScript instanceof 运算符来确定事件发生在哪种轨道上，然后输出消息到控制台，以指示事件是哪种轨道以及是否将其添加到元素或从元素中删除。

trans-unit.source: The event has arrived at the event's target. Event listeners registered for this phase are called at this time. If Event.bubbles is false, processing the event is finished after this phase is complete.
trans-unit.target: 事件已到达事件的目标。此时将调用为此阶段注册的事件侦听器。如果 Event.bubbles 为false，则在此阶段完成后，将完成对事件的处理。

trans-unit.source: The event is being propagated through the target's ancestor objects. This process starts with the Window, then Document, then the HTMLHtmlElement, and so on through the elements until the target's parent is reached. Event listeners registered for capture mode when EventTarget.addEventListener() was called are triggered during this phase.
trans-unit.target: 事件正在通过目标的祖先对象传播。此过程从 Window 开始，然后是 Document ，然后是 HTMLHtmlElement ，依此类推，直到元素到达目标的父级为止。在此阶段，将触发在调用 EventTarget.addEventListener() 时注册为捕获模式的事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The event is fired for all connections that are created when monitoring incoming presentation connections.
trans-unit.target: 为监视传入的演示文稿连接而创建的所有连接均触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is fired when a pointer becomes active. For mouse, it is fired when the device transitions from no buttons depressed to at least one button depressed. For touch, it is fired when physical contact is made with the digitizer. For pen, it is fired when the stylus makes physical contact with the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 当指针变为活动状态时将触发该事件。对于鼠标，当设备从没有按下的按钮过渡到至少按下的一个按钮时，将触发该按钮。对于触摸，当与数字转换器进行物理接触时会触发。对于笔，当手写笔与数字转换器物理接触时会触发。

trans-unit.source: The event is passed into the event handler in the form of a TrackEvent object, whose track property identifies the newly-added track.
trans-unit.target: 该事件以 TrackEvent 对象的形式传递到事件处理程序中，该对象的 track 属性标识新添加的轨道。

trans-unit.source: The event is passed into the event handler in the form of a TrackEvent object, whose track property identifies the track that was removed from the media element's AudioTrackList.
trans-unit.target: 该事件以 TrackEvent 对象的形式传递到事件处理程序中，该事件的 track 属性标识从媒体元素的 AudioTrackList 中删除的轨道。

trans-unit.source: The event is passed into the event handler in the form of a TrackEvent object, whose track property identifies the track that was removed from the media element's VideoTrackList.
trans-unit.target: 事件以 TrackEvent 对象的形式传递到事件处理程序中，该事件的 track 属性标识从媒体元素的 VideoTrackList 中删除的轨道。

trans-unit.source: The event is passed into the event handler in the form of an Event object; the event doesn't provide any additional information. To determine the new state of media's tracks, you'll have to look at their AudioTrack.enabled flags.
trans-unit.target: 事件以 Event 对象的形式传递到事件处理程序中。该事件未提供任何其他信息。要确定媒体轨道的新状态，您必须查看其 AudioTrack.enabled 标志。

trans-unit.source: The event is passed into the event handler in the form of an Event object; the event doesn't provide any additional information. To determine the new state of media's tracks, you'll have to look at their VideoTrack.enabled flags.
trans-unit.target: 事件以 Event 对象的形式传递到事件处理程序中。该事件未提供任何其他信息。要确定媒体轨道的新状态，您必须查看其 VideoTrack.enabled 标志。

trans-unit.source: The event is propagating back up through the target's ancestors in reverse order, starting with the parent, and eventually reaching the containing Window. This is known as bubbling, and occurs only if Event.bubbles is true. Event listeners registered for this phase are triggered during this process.
trans-unit.target: 事件是从父级开始，以相反的顺序通过目标祖先传播回来的，最终到达包含它的 Window 。这被称为冒泡，并且仅在 Event.bubbles 为 true 时发生。在此过程中触发为此阶段注册的事件侦听器。

trans-unit.target: 事件监听器回调

trans-unit.source: The event listener can be specified as either a callback function or as an object that implements EventListener, whose handleEvent() method serves as the callback function.

trans-unit.source: The events based on this interface are addtrack and removetrack
trans-unit.target: 基于此接口的事件为 addtrack 和 removetrack

trans-unit.source: The events needed to handle generic pointer input are analogous to mouse events (mousedown/pointerdown, mousemove/pointermove, etc.). Consequently, pointer event types are intentionally similar to mouse event types. Additionally, a pointer event contains the usual properties present in mouse events (client coordinates, target element, button states, etc.) in addition to new properties for other forms of input: pressure, contact geometry, tilt, etc. In fact, the PointerEvent interface inherits all of the MouseEvent's properties thus facilitating migrating content from mouse events to pointer events.
trans-unit.target: 处理通用指针输入所需的事件类似于 mouse events （ mousedown/pointerdown ， mousemove/pointermove 等）。因此，指针事件类型有意类似于鼠标事件类型。此外，指针事件还包含鼠标事件中存在的常规属性（客户端坐标，目标元素，按钮状态等），以及其他形式的输入的新属性：压力，接触几何形状，倾斜度等。 PointerEvent 接口继承了 MouseEvent's 所有属性，从而有助于将内容从鼠标事件迁移到指针事件。

trans-unit.source: The fastest, most widely useable, most standard, and most future-ready way to solve the unicode problem is by transforming the UTF16 into UTF8-in-16 then use btoa on the UTF8-in-16 string. To understand this deeper, UTF16 uses 16 bits as the smallest unit of measure whereas UTF8 uses 8 bits as the smallest unit of measure. This means that the smallest a UTF16 character can be is 16 bits (2 bytes) meanwhile the smallest a UTF8 character can be is 8 bits (1 byte). Then, UTF8-in-16 is making the string encoded as UTF-8, but storing it as a UTF-16 string by only using 8 (from UTF8) of the 16 bits in each unit of measure of a UTF-16 string. This method is incredibly efficient because all it takes is a single simple super fast String.prototype.replace to convert between UTF-16 and UTF8-in-16. There is no need to encode the string as an array buffer then reencode it as a string. Rather, the below code simply and straightforwardly converts it in a single String.prototype.replace.
trans-unit.target: 解决unicode问题的最快，最广泛使用，最标准，最适合未来的方法是将UTF16转换为UTF8-in-16，然后对UTF8-in-16字符串使用 btoa 。为了更深入地了解这一点，UTF16使用16位作为最小度量单位，而UTF8使用8位作为最小度量单位。这意味着UTF16字符的最小长度为16位（2字节），而UTF8字符的最小长度为8位（1字节）。然后，UTF8-in-16将字符串编码为UTF-8，但通过仅使用UTF-16字符串的每个度量单位中的16位中的8位（来自UTF8），将其存储为UTF-16字符串。该方法非常有效，因为它只需要一个简单的超快速 String.prototype.replace 在UTF-16和UTF8-in-16之间转换。无需将字符串编码为数组缓冲区，然后将其重新编码为字符串。而是，下面的代码简单直接地将其转换为单个 String.prototype.replace 。

trans-unit.source: The final benefit of using homogeneous coordinates is that they fit very nicely for multiplying against 4x4 matrices. A vertex must match at least one of the dimensions of a matrix in order to be multiplied against it. The 4x4 matrix can be used to encode a variety of useful transformations. In fact, the typical perspective matrix uses the division by the w component to achieve its transformation.

Finally if you want to move the camera around, a view matrix is needed to define the location of the camera in the scene.

trans-unit.source: The first section of the JavaScript code establishes some variables we'll be using. shipSize contains the size of the ship the player is moving around, for convenience. position is used to track the position of the ship within the play field. moveRate and turnRate are the number of pixels forward and backward each keystroke moves the ship and how many degrees of rotation the left and right steering controls apply per keystroke. angle is the current amount of rotation applied to the ship, in degrees; it starts at 0° (pointing straight up). Finally, spaceship is set to refer to the element with the ID "spaceship", which is the SVG polygon representing the ship the player controls.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript代码的第一部分建立了一些我们将要使用的变量。为了方便起见， shipSize 包含玩家正在移动的飞船的大小。 position 用于跟踪战场内船舶的位置。 moveRate 和 turnRate 是每次击键使飞船前进和后退的像素数，以及每个击键应用的左右转向控件旋转的度数。角度是当前应用于船舶的旋转量，以度为单位；它从0°开始（指向上方）。最后，将 spaceship 设置为引用ID为 "spaceship" 的元素，该元素是表示玩家控制的飞船的SVG多边形。

trans-unit.source: The first simple example returns a reference to the HTML/document node:

trans-unit.source: The first step is to clear the canvas to our background color; then we establish the camera's perspective. We set a field of view of 45°, with a width to height ratio that match the display dimensions of our canvas. We also specify that we only want objects between 0.1 and 100 units from the camera to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 第一步是将画布清除为我们的背景色；然后我们建立摄影机的视角 我们将视场设置为45°，宽高比与画布的显示尺寸匹配。我们还指定只希望渲染相机中介于0.1和100个单位之间的对象。

trans-unit.source: The first step is to create the "local" end of the connection. This is the peer that will send out the connection request. The next step is to create the RTCDataChannel by calling RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() and set up event listeners to monitor the channel so that we know when it's opened and closed (that is, when the channel is connected or disconnected within that peer connection).
trans-unit.target: 第一步是创建连接的“本地”端。这是将发出连接请求的对等方。下一步是通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() 创建 RTCDataChannel ，并设置事件侦听器以监视通道，以便我们知道何时打开和关闭通道（即，在该对等连接中通道是断开还是断开连接）。

trans-unit.source: The first step is to create the <video> element that we'll use to retrieve the video frames:
trans-unit.target: 第一步是创建用于检索视频帧的 <video> 元素：

trans-unit.source: The first step is to draw a large rectangle with the default settings. Next we save this state and make changes to the fill color. We then draw the second and smaller blue rectangle and save the state. Again we change some drawing settings and draw the third semi-transparent white rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 第一步是用默认设置画一个大的矩形。接下来我们保存这个状态,并对填充颜色进行修改。然后我们绘制第二个也是较小的蓝色矩形并保存状态。再次我们改变一些绘制设置,绘制第三个半透明的白色矩形。

trans-unit.source: The first step is to establish a drop zone. Exactly what part of your content will accept drops may vary depending on the design of your application, but making an element receive drop events is easy:
trans-unit.target: 第一步是建立一个投放区。您的内容中的哪些部分会接受滴滴,可能会根据您的应用程序的设计而有所不同,但让一个元素接受滴滴事件是很容易的。

trans-unit.source: The first step to create a path is to call the beginPath(). Internally, paths are stored as a list of sub-paths (lines, arcs, etc) which together form a shape. Every time this method is called, the list is reset and we can start drawing new shapes.
trans-unit.target: 创建路径的第一步是调用 beginPath() 。在内部，路径存储为一起形成形状的子路径（线，弧等）的列表。每次调用此方法时，列表都会重置，我们可以开始绘制新形状。

trans-unit.source: The first thing that needs to be done in order to draw a frame of the animation is to clear the background to the desired color. In this case, we set the viewport based on the size of the <canvas>, call clearColor() to set the color to use when clearing content, then we clear the buffer with clear().
trans-unit.target: 为了绘制动画帧，需要做的第一件事是将背景清除为所需的颜色。在这种情况下，我们根据 <canvas> 的大小设置视口，调用 clearColor() 设置清除内容时要使用的颜色，然后使用 clear() 清除缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The first thing the callback does is check to see if the video is even playing; if it's not, the callback returns immediately without doing anything.
trans-unit.target: 回调做的第一件事是检查视频是否正在播放;如果没有,回调就会立即返回,不做任何事情。

trans-unit.source: The first thing to do is add code to load the textures. In our case, we'll be using a single texture, mapped onto all six sides of our rotating cube, but the same technique can be used for any number of textures.
trans-unit.target: 首先要做的是添加代码来加载纹理。在我们的例子中,我们将使用一个单一的纹理,映射到旋转立方体的所有六个面,但同样的技术可以用于任何数量的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The first thing to do is update the vertex shader so it generates a shading value for each vertex based on the ambient lighting as well as the directional lighting. Let's take a look at the code:
trans-unit.target: 首先要做的是更新顶点着色器,使其根据环境光照以及方向光照为每个顶点生成一个着色值。让我们来看看这段代码。

trans-unit.source: The first thing we do here is obtain a reference to the canvas, assigning it to a variable named canvas.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里要做的第一件事是获得对canvas的引用，将其分配给名为 canvas 的变量。

trans-unit.source: The first thing we do is transform the normal based on the current orientation of the cube, by multiplying the vertex's normal by the normal matrix. We can then compute the amount of directional lighting that needs to be applied to the vertex by calculating the dot product of the transformed normal and the directional vector (that is, the direction from which the light is coming). If this value is less than zero, then we pin the value to zero, since you can't have less than zero light.
trans-unit.target: 我们首先要做的是根据立方体当前的方向变换法线,将顶点的法线乘以法线矩阵。然后,我们可以通过计算变换后的法线和方向向量(也就是光线来自的方向)的点乘,计算出需要应用在顶点上的定向照明量。如果这个值小于零,那么我们就把这个值钉到零,因为你的光照不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: The first thing we need is to create a Keyframe Object corresponding to our CSS @keyframes block:
trans-unit.target: 我们需要做的第一件事是创建一个与我们的CSS @keyframes块相对应的Keyframe对象：

trans-unit.source: The first thing we need to do is generate the array of normals for all the vertices that comprise our cube. Since a cube is a very simple object, this is easy to do; obviously for more complex objects, calculating the normals will be more involved.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要做的第一件事是为构成立方体的所有顶点生成法线数组。由于立方体是一个非常简单的对象,这很容易做到;显然,对于更复杂的对象,计算法线会更加复杂。

trans-unit.source: The first thing you need in order to use WebGL for rendering is a canvas. The HTML fragment below declares a canvas that our sample will draw into.
trans-unit.target: 要使用WebGL进行渲染,您首先需要的是一个画布。下面的HTML片段声明了一个画布,我们的示例将在画布中绘制。

trans-unit.source: The first thing you'll want to do with almost all of the requests you generate is to add success and error handlers:
trans-unit.target: 你要做的第一件事就是为你生成的几乎所有请求添加成功和错误处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The first three of these event handlers are required; you have to handle them to do anything involving streamed media with WebRTC. The rest aren't strictly required but can be useful, and we'll explore them. There are a few other events available that we're not using in this example, as well. Here's a summary of each of the event handlers we will be implementing:
trans-unit.target: 这些事件处理程序中的前三个是必需的;你必须处理它们才能用WebRTC做任何涉及流媒体的事情。其余的事件并不是严格要求的,但可能很有用,我们将对它们进行探讨。还有一些其他可用的事件,我们在这个例子中也没有使用。下面是我们将要实现的每个事件处理程序的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The focus event is raised when the user sets focus on the given element.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将焦点设置在给定元素上时,焦点事件就会被触发。

trans-unit.source: The focus of a selection is the end point of the selection. When making a selection with a mouse, the focus is where in the document the mouse button is released. As the user changes the selection using the mouse or the keyboard, the focus is the end of the selection that moves. Note: This is not the same as the focused element of the document, as returned by document.activeElement.
trans-unit.target: 选择的焦点是选择的终点。使用鼠标进行选择时，焦点是在文档中释放鼠标按钮的位置。当用户使用鼠标或键盘更改选择时，焦点就是移动的选择的结尾。注意：这与document.activeElement返回的 document.activeElement 的聚焦元素不同。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of DOMHighResTimeStamp and the Performance.now() method. The now() method returns a timestamp (of type DOMHighResTimeStamp) that is a discrete point in time. By calling this method before and after a task, the time it takes to do the task can be measured.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示 DOMHighResTimeStamp 和 Performance.now() 方法的用法。在 now() 方法返回一个时间戳（类型的 DOMHighResTimeStamp ），其是在时间上的离散点。通过在任务之前和之后调用此方法，可以测量完成任务所需的时间。
